com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator
Class NonFractionMapping

java.lang.Object
  com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator.InlineXBRLMapping
      com.fujitsu.xml.xbrl.inlinexbrl.generator.NonFractionMapping

public class NonFractionMapping
extends InlineXBRLMapping

A mapping between a numeric fact(except fraction item type) and XHTML nodes.

After processing this mapping, an ix:nonFraction element will be created, which contains the digit, grouping separator, and decimal point characters within the value of the specified text node.

For example, when a text node that has the value "(123,456.789)" is specified, ix:nonFraction element will be created as follows:

(<ix:nonFraction ...>123,456.789<ix:nonFraction>)

Also, depending on the version of Inline XBRL generated, The following attributes will be set to the ix:nonFraction:

Inline XBRL 1.0 Documents

Attribute Value
contextRef The value of the id attribute of the context referred from the fact
decimals The value of the decimals attribute of the fact. If the fact does not have a decimals attribute, this attribute will not be output
footnoteRefs Automatically generated from the footnotes related with the fact. If no footnotes are related with the facts, this attribute will not be output
format The value of the format argument specified in the constructor. If the format argument is null, this attribute will not be output
id The value of the id attribute of the fact. If the fact does not have an id attribute, this attribute will not be output
name The element name of the fact
order Automatically generated if the fact belongs to a tuple
precision The value of the precision attribute of the fact. If the fact does not have a precision attribute, this attribute will not be output
scale The value of the scale argument specified in the constructor
sign If the value of the fact is negative, this attribute will be output with the value "-". Otherwise this attribute will not be output
tupleRef Automatically generated if the fact belongs to a tuple
unitRef The value of the id attribute of the unit referred from the fact
Other attributes If the fact has attributes with a namespace name which has a value other than http://www.xbrl.org/2008/inlineXBRL, these attributes will be copied

Inline XBRL 1.1 Documents
Attribute Value
contextRef The value of the id attribute of the context referred from the fact
decimals The value of the decimals attribute of the fact. If the fact does not have a decimals attribute, this attribute will not be output
format The value of the format argument specified in the constructor. If the format argument is null, this attribute will not be output
id It is generated automatically from footnotes or explanatory facts associated with facts. It is not output if no footnote or explanation fact is associated.
name The element name of the fact
order Automatically generated if the fact belongs to a tuple
precision The value of the precision attribute of the fact. If the fact does not have a precision attribute, this attribute will not be output
scale The value of the scale argument specified in the constructor
sign If the value of the fact is negative, this attribute will be output with the value "-". Otherwise this attribute will not be output
tupleRef Automatically generated if the fact belongs to a tuple
unitRef The value of the id attribute of the unit referred from the fact
Other attributes If the fact has attributes with a namespace name which has a value other than http://www.xbrl.org/2013/inlineXBRL, these attributes will be copied

NonFractionMapping

                          int scale)

Constructs a mapping between a numeric fact and an XHTML node.

Parameters:
item - numeric fact
node - XHTML node
format - format type. or null if the format type is not necessary
scale - scale attribute value of ix:nonFraction element
Throws:
java.lang.NullPointerException - Thrown if item or node is null.
